name: 一同
text: ありがとうございましたー！
trans: Thank you!!

name: はづき
text:
は～い、それじゃあみなさん
記念に写真を撮りますよ～……
trans:
Okay, everyone.
Pose for a commemorative photo...

name: 霧子
trans: O-Okay!

name: 結華
text:
……もしもし、はづきちさん？
シャッターはいつおりるのでしょうか？
trans: ...Erm, Hazukichi? How long are you going to wait before pressing the button?

name: はづき
text: え？　もう押しちゃいました～
trans: What? I've already pressed it...

name: 一同
text: ……ええっ！？

name: 恋鐘
text: え～！？　うち多分、目ばつぶったままたい！
trans: Eeeeeh!? But I think I had my eyes closed!

name: 結華
text:
はづきちさん、突然はダメでしょ！
仮にもアイドル！　写真は商材！　かけ声をください！
trans: Hazukichi, you can't take any old photo! Even for second-rate idols like us! Photos can make or break an idol's career! You gotta say "cheese" first!

name: はづき
text:
仮にもなんて言っちゃダメですよ、三峰さん
みなさんは立派なアイドルなんですから～
trans:
Don't say second-rate, Mitsumine.
You're all proper, fully fledged idols.

name: はづき
text: では、もう１枚いきますね～
trans: Alright, let's take one more.

name: はづき
text: 気分は～？
trans: How does it feel being an idol?

name: 一同
text: ……最高っ！
trans: It's the best!

name: はづき
text:
はいっ
いいのが撮れました♪　……ほら
trans: That one came out well. Take a look, here...

name: 咲耶
text: うん。みんな、いい表情をしているね
trans: Good. Our expressions came out nicely.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ。ライブ成功の、いい記念になったな
みんな、デビューおめでとう！
trans: It will make a fine souvenir of your first Live. Congratulations on your debut!

name: 恋鐘
text:
う～～～～っ、ばり楽しかった！
うちらが揃えば最強たい！
trans: Squee... That was super fun! When we work together, we're totally unstoppable!

name: 結華
text:
ほんとほんと！　みんな初めてのライブなのに、
全然緊張してた感じしないしさー
trans: I know, right? And even though it was our first live, we didn't look nervous or anything.

name: 咲耶
text:
そういう結華こそ、
緊張とは無縁のステージだったんじゃないかい？
trans: You can say that again, Yuika! You were so cool it was like you were on a completely different stage.

name: 結華
text:
そう見えた？　三峰さっすが演技派だな～
……でも残念、内心バックバクだったんだよー
trans: Is that how it looked? Mitsumine's a natural! ...is what I'd like people to think, but actually my heart was pounding out of my chest, you know?

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、確かに。私もとても緊張していたからよくわかるよ
trans: Haha, indeed. I was really nervous too, so I can understand that.

name: 咲耶
text:
でも、ステージに立った時、不思議と緊張がほぐれたんだ
みんなと作ったこの衣装が力をくれたんだね
trans: Yet strangely enough, once I was on stage, any fear seemed to disappear. The costumes that we made must have given me strength.

name: 恋鐘
text:
あっ、それはうちにもわかるばい！
みんなと頑張ってきたって思い出せて、元気が出たとよ
trans: I understand! The memories of how hard we worked are sewn into these costumes. I get energised just by recalling them.

name: 恋鐘
text: 摩美々、こん歯車の飾り、ありがとね～！
trans: So Mamimi, we owe you for the cogwheel accessories!

name: 摩美々
text: ……ちょっとー……抱きつかないでってー
trans: ...Wait... Stop hugging me...

name: 摩美々
text:
それに、私じゃなくて霧子のおかげでしょー？
コンセプト、まとまってなかったかもしれないんだからぁ
trans: In any case, wasn't the concept originally Kiriko's idea? I'm not sure if we managed to bring it to fruition in the end, but...

name: 霧子
text:
わたしは……そんな……
みんなといっしょに……いさせてもらっただけだよ……
trans: No, I'm just... I'm just happy to have the opportunity to be a part of this group...

name: 霧子
text:
でも、歯車の飾り……
ステージで……きらきらしてたね……
trans: When we were on stage... the cogwheels were really sparkly, weren't they...?

name: 結華
text: うんうんっ、三峰たちって感じがしてよかったよ
trans: Yeah, yeah! They're a good fit for our group's image.

name: 咲耶
text:
そうだね。本当に私たちらしかった
５つの歯車は、ここから回り始めるんだね
trans: Indeed. One could say that the cogwheels are what makes us L'Antica. We should rotate the five of them between us from now on.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ああ、そうだ
本当に、ここからスタートだな
trans: Great idea! It feels like we've finally reached the beginning of the story.

name: 恋鐘
text:
よぉしっ！　このままの勢いで
『W.I.N.G.』にも優勝して、トップアイドルたい！
trans: Alright! Let's keep this enthusiasm going, defeat W.I.N.G., and and become Top Idols!

name: 結華
text: おーっと、こがたんってば、また大きく出たね～
trans: Oooh, Kogatan's getting her grand ideas again.

name: 咲耶
text:
でも、不思議だよ……
恋鐘が言うと、なぜかできそうな気がする
trans: But when I listen to her, I have the funny feeling that they might just come true.

name: 摩美々
text: 私はこんなに疲れるの、もうこりごりかもー
trans: I'm already so tired... Future me is probably going to regret this...

name: 恋鐘
text:
何言っとうと！
絶対に『W.I.N.G.』優勝するったい！
trans:
Nonsense!
We're going to defeat W.I.N.G. and that's that!

name: 恋鐘
text: 摩美々は途中で怠けようとするの、直さんと！
trans: Mamimi! You must cure those slovenly habits!

name: 摩美々
text:
えー、私だけー？
私よりー、三峰は立ち位置、ミスりかけたでしょー
trans:
Ehh? Why are you picking on me?
When it was Mitsumine who got her stage positioning wrong?

name: 結華
text:
ミスりかけただけだもーん
立て直したんだからノーカンでーす
trans: Yeah, yeah, I made a little slip-up, so what? I got back in position right away so no big deal.

name: 結華
text:
……まぁ次からは？
ミスりかけもしないようにするけどさ
trans: I'll make sure I get it right next time, okay?

name: 霧子
text:
わたし……
ソロのとこ……足が震えて……
trans: As for me... during the solo.. my legs were shaking...

name: 恋鐘
text:
なんね、それなら、反省会が必要やね！
さっそくカラオケにでも行くばい！
trans:
That's why that an evaluation meeting is in order.
How about we do it at the karaoke bar?

name: 霧子
text:
ひゃっ……！
こ、恋鐘ちゃん……！？
trans:
Hya...!
K-Kogane!?

name: 摩美々
text:
……だからぁ
抱きつかないでもらえるー？
trans: ...As I said before, stop hugging me...

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、祝賀会でもいいような気はするけど
trans: Haha, let's think of it more as a celebration party.

name: 結華
text:
でもま。どっちにしろカラオケでしょ？
予約入れとこーっと
trans:
Whichever it is, we're going to karaoke, right?
I'll reserve a booth!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ほらほら、結華も咲耶もはよこんね～！
カラオケは待ってくれんとよー♪
trans:
My, my, Yuika, Sakuya. Aren't you eager?
Karaoke, wait for me!!
